reviewText: This DVD won't play on my DVD player. Terrible buy. There was no warning that this DVD was from another country and wouldn't play on an American DVD player.

DO NOT BUY IF YOU LIVE IN THE U.S.A. or CANADA!!!!!!!!!!

This is HIDDEN under the PRODUCT DETAILS!!!

"This DVD will not play on most DVD players sold in the US or Canada [Region 1]. This item requires a region specific or multi-region DVD player and compatible TV."

I would have given negative stars but negative is not an option!!!!!
Read description certain ones will not play on US dvd players. I didn't read reviews first and now Im stuck with a dvd that I cannot play.
Doesn't work in any of my DVD players or my kids PS4

I got this DVD and one other for my daughter for her birthday, she was so excited.. put it in the DVD player and it said wrong region.. wasn't sure what was going on, got on here to see if I could read some reviews and stuff to figure it out.. after reading the whole description found other you can't watch this on a regular DVD player it is a special kind of DVD player from who knows where.. so upset my daughter couldn't watch either one of her new movies and I just wasted the money that could of got her something else..
They are going to love this movie
